channel.title: FRRouting Overview on Cumulus Networks Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in FRRouting Overview on Cumulus Networks Documentation

item.title: Upgrading from Quagga to FRRouting
item.description: Cumulus Linux 3.4 and later releases replace Quagga with FRRouting. This section outlines the upgrade process for users currently using Quagga. These instructions only apply to upgrading to Cumulus Linux 3.4 or later from releases earlier than 3.4. New image installations contain frr instead of quagga or quagga-compat. If you are using any automation tools to configure your network and are installing a new Cumulus Linux image, make sure your automation tools refer to FRR and not to Quagga.
